Hmm haven't seen that one before. Can you email me your device model, and I'll try help? You can find the email address under the app listing.

title: Great
comment: This app not only does exactly what it promises but it puts the offical Three My3 app to shame.

title: This app should be on 3's shopping list
comment: Works far better than 3's official app, setup is easy, and is nice and snappy when not waiting for 3 to respond.

title: Excellent app.
comment: This app. Gives what it promises: information about your account balance and a useful reminder the date your internet add on is going to expire. Three will never do that since for them it is better that you forget the expiry date!. So it is great to have this option and FOR FREE! I had a problem with them for a change in my expiry date that consumed all my balance. They did not want to accept any responsibility. At least the engineer of this app. Was really helpful and replied to all my queries .
Thank you.

title: Easy to use
comment: Nice app.. convenient to use! Make my life more easier

title: Brilliant
comment: Works perfectly, very much appreciated.

title: One of my most used apps
comment: Great app to use instead of dialing 1744, which takes a lot longer. Thanks to the developer.

title: Great, but could be a lil better.
comment: Great app to have. Makes life just that little bit easier when I want to check my credit or data usage. Adding figures to the UI that show the difference in balance and data since last refresh would make this app even better. I'm too lazy to do it in my head.. :L
Thanks for your feedback. Would an option to so a history of the last X number of refreshes be helpful?
